Title: Both Sides Now
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Ronald D. Moore (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Tobias Menzies, Graham McTavish
Plot: In 1945, Frank is still seeking Claire, but is starting to lose hope of ever finding her. Meanwhile in 1743, Claire is trying to come to terms with her marriage to Jamie. While traveling, a life changing opportunity arises.
